ARABIC: قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Did I not say that you would not be able to bear with me?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did I not tell you," he replied, "that you will not be able to bear with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He replied: "Did I not tell you that you will not be able to patiently bear with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "Did I not tell you that you would not be able to remain patient with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Did I not say that you will never be able to patiently stay with me?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Did I not tell you, that you would not be able to have patience with me"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Did I not say that you will not be able to have patience with me?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Did I not say that thou couldst never bear with me patiently?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Did I not tell thee that thou couldst not bear with me?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He replied, "Did I not tell you that you would never be able to bear with me patiently?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: said I not that thou wouldst not be able to have with me patience?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Did I not say that you cannot have patience with me?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He answered: "Did I not tell thee that thou canst have no patience with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Khidr) said: "Did I not tell you, that you would not be able to have patience with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did I not I tell you' he replied, 'that you would not bear patiently with me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Did I not tell you that you will not be able to endure with me?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not say that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:72] He said, ‘Did I not say [that] you would not be able to bear with me?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Khidr said to him: (Did I not tell thee) Moses (thou couldst not bear with me?)
